title: cmd/gc: blank identifier bug
body:
by **aaron678**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?

http://play.golang.org/p/a5PFtKqvoP

What is the expected output?

4
5
6

What do you see instead?

4
4
5

I get the same behavior using go1.0.1 on OS X.

relevant newsgroup thread:
https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups#!topic/golang-nuts/2fTG_lBSJ50
